scripts.minify-js: terser public/js/appearance.js -c -m -o public/js/appearance.min.js && terser public/js/menu.js public/js/code.js public/js/scroll.js -c -m -o public/js/main.bundle.min.js && terser public/js/search.js -c -m -o public/js/search.min.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm rum minify-html
